Implemented Security Controls.Access Control: The contract lacks an explicit access control on the forward function, allowing anyone to call it and use delegatecall.

Risky Usage.Delegatecall Vulnerability: The contract uses delegatecall, which can execute code in the context of the proxy contract and alter its storage. It should only delegate to trusted addresses.

Fallback Functionality: Not applicable, as no fallback function is implemented in this contract.
